t: Amazon.com : Choceur Milk Chocolate 5.29 OZ (2 Pack) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This chocolate adheres to its European roots. It contains a hazelnut cream which gives the chocolate body and distinction. It tastes like a premium chocolate, yet the price is reasonable, nor is it excessively sweet (as many domestic brands are). The chocolate arrived fresh.
